/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the lush greenery of the trees lining the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and beige, add a touch of urban charm to the scene. People can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static cityscape. The sun shines brightly in the top right corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
